overview: Girlfriend Films is here with another movie devoted strictly to you lesbian fans out there! Girlfriend Films is known for providing some of the hottest lesbian content out there and Lesbian Encounters is no exception! Cum and get down and dirty with Ash Hollywood, Esperanza Diaz, Jenna J Ross, Kiera Winters, Natasha Malkova, Vanessa Cage, Veruca James and Yurizan Beltran!
title: Lesbian Encounters
